00020 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00021 
00022 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_DEF1(remove_reference,T,T)
00023 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,remove_reference,T&,T)
00024 
00025 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ < 0x600)
00026 // these are illegal specialisations; cv-qualifies applied to
00027 // references have no effect according to [8.3.2p1],
00028 // C++ Builder requires them though as it treats cv-qualified
00029 // references as distinct types...
00030 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,remove_reference,T& const,T)
00031 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,remove_reference,T& volatile,T)
00032 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,remove_reference,T& const volatile,T)
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #else
00036 
00037 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_DEF1(remove_reference,T,typename detail::remove_reference_impl<T>::type)
00038 
00039 #endif // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
